channel.title: Repository metada has date in the future, prevents apt-get update to work
channel.description:
I'll be short: ``` [user@disp364 Downloads]$ curl -s https://deb.kicksecure.com/dists/bullseye-testers/InRelease | grep ^Date Date: Sun, 16 Apr 2023 15:15:42 UTC [user@disp364 Downloads]$ date -u Sun Apr 16 14:34:34 UTC 2023 ```
Applies to other repos too.

item.title: Repository metada has date in the future, prevents apt-get update to work
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Fixed itself?

I’ll try avoid this error in the future.

Read full topic
item.source: Repository metada has date in the future, prevents apt-get update to work

item.title: Repository metada has date in the future, prevents apt-get update to work
item.dc:creator: marmarek
item.description:
I’ll be short:

[user@disp364 Downloads]$ curl -s https://deb.kicksecure.com/dists/bullseye-testers/InRelease | grep ^Date
Date: Sun, 16 Apr 2023 15:15:42 UTC
[user@disp364 Downloads]$ date -u
Sun Apr 16 14:34:34 UTC 2023

Applies to other repos too.

Read full topic
